thread.title: Refugee crisis: Minister tasked with resettling 20,000 Syrian refugees dismisses criticism of scheme
thread.title_full: Refugee crisis: Minister tasked with resettling 20,000 Syrian refugees dismisses criticism of scheme - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Refugee crisis: Minister tasked with resettling 20,000 Syrian refugees dismisses criticism of scheme
text: The minister tasked with resettling 20,000 Syrian refugees in the UK has dismissed criticism from senior judges and lawyers that the scheme is inadequate. Richard Harrington claimed a suggestion by one retired judge that the UK could take as many as 75,000 refugees was a number picked " completely out of the air " . Read more
